sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import DetailProduct from 'DetailProduct'; import './style.scss'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Product({ list }) { return (
{ list.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

{item.price}đ {item.price * (100 - item.discount) / 100}đ
{item.sold} đã bán
{item.code} {item.rate} Rating
Yêu thích
{item.discount} Giảm
)) }
); } export default Product;
